Text:
Wild West Alaska 
The Kodiak Experience 
TV-14 (L), CC 

Hans teaches a young mother how to survive on dangerous, bear infested Kodiak Island. When a colorful character -- Alaska's state "mustache champion" - brings in a load of old guns, Ken and the Wild West crew search for a diamond in the rough.
Thanks for the description!!  I wished the TvTeam would do that!!!!!
